original_text: On the fifth day of the sixth month of the sixth year, I was sitting in my house. The leaders of Judah were sitting in front of me. While I sat there, the Almighty Lord took hold of me with great power.
korean_text: 여섯째 해 여섯째 달 초닷새에 나는 집에 앉았고 유다의 장로들은 내 앞에 앉아 있는데 주 여호와의 권능이 거기에서 내게 내리기로

sentences.original_text: On the fifth day of the sixth month
I was sitting in my house
The leaders of Judah were sitting in front of me
sentences.korean_translation: 유다 지도자들이 내 앞에 앉아 있었다

sentences.original_text: the Almighty Lord took hold of me
